text: @realDonaldTrump @Elvisonatree Coming from the “numbers” obsessed narcissist. Since day 1 you have been lying about numbers...inauguration crowd, wealth (SCOTUS), IQ, COVID-19 deaths, 9/11...there are dozens there...on and on. So no, can’t believe you. https://t.co/h0J3svH1Zk
